SpecificationMongoRepository
public interface MongoSpecificationExecutor<T>
A mongo specification executor.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    count(ISpecification<T> spec)
    Returns the number of instances that the given ISpecification will return.
    List<T>
    findAll(ISpecification<T> spec)
    Returns all entities matching the given ISpecification.
    org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T>
    findAll(ISpecification<T> spec, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Returns a Page of entities matching the given ISpecification.
    List<T>
    findAll(ISpecification<T> spec, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
    Returns all entities matching the given ISpecification and Sort.
    Optional<T>
    findOne(ISpecification<T> spec)
    Returns a single entity matching the given ISpecification or Optional.empty() if none found.
